snippet.title: Heavy Duty Challenge - First Gameplay Teaser | Nano Games
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam - https://bit.ly/HeavyDutyChallenge

Heavy Duty Challenge is a challenge-based, non-racing motorsport game in which truck drivers prove their skills by overcoming difficult terrain and obstacles. Drive through rocky fields of European quarries and finish every level with more precision and with a better skill than your opponents!

HDC Newsletter https://hdcthegame.com/

Learn more:
https://www.facebook.com/HDCthegame
https://www.twitter.com/HDCthegame
https://www.instagram.com/HDCthegame

Music Provided By Mediacharger: https://www.youtube.com/user/MediaCharger
Music Created By Dirty Protest
Song Title: Behind The Mask
https://youtu.be/05s7i2RW86k

#HeavyDutyChallenge #HDCthegame #SimulationGame #EuropaTruckTrial #NanoGames
